name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE COLLAB】hololive English -Council- and IRyS Special 3D Collab! #CouncilRyS3D [sEnjWtbnUj4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: The members of hololive English -Promise- continue showcasing their special 3D merchandise.
MC section where the members thank the audience and the fans chant for an encore.
Encore performance of the song 'GO!!!' originally by FLOW.

subtitles.original: Next, okay starting with...
subtitles.english: Next, okay starting with...

subtitles.original: Fauna!
subtitles.english: Fauna!

subtitles.original: I'm up first!
subtitles.english: I'm up first!

subtitles.original: Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original:
Sap-Ring Smartphone Ring
Size: Approx. H30xW30mm
Material: Zinc Alloy, Iron
subtitles.english:
Sap-Ring Smartphone Ring
Size: Approx. H30xW30mm
Material: Zinc Alloy, Iron

subtitles.original: I have to show off for you the Sap-Ring Smartphone Ring,
subtitles.english: I have to show off for you the Sap-Ring Smartphone Ring,

subtitles.original: an object which I personally have found very useful.
subtitles.english: an object which I personally have found very useful.

subtitles.original: Stick it on the back of your phone, any phone,
subtitles.english: Stick it on the back of your phone, any phone,

subtitles.original: and use it to stand up your phone, watch YouTube,
subtitles.english: and use it to stand up your phone, watch YouTube,

subtitles.original: watch Hololive wherever you are.
subtitles.english: watch Hololive wherever you are.

subtitles.original: Wherever you go, you'll have a stand.
subtitles.english: Wherever you go, you'll have a stand.

subtitles.original: And it's in the cute shape of a sapling!
subtitles.english: And it's in the cute shape of a sapling!

subtitles.original: Yay! Nice! Perfect! Perfect!
subtitles.english: Yay! Nice! Perfect! Perfect!

subtitles.original: Next is me! What's up? Yeah,
subtitles.english: Next is me! What's up? Yeah,

subtitles.original:
Warden's Capely Embrace Blanket
Size: Approx. H70xW100cm
Material: Polyester
subtitles.english:
Warden's Capely Embrace Blanket
Size: Approx. H70xW100cm
Material: Polyester

subtitles.original: so have you ever wanted me to hug you?
subtitles.english: so have you ever wanted me to hug you?

subtitles.original: Well, I will never do that.
subtitles.english: Well, I will never do that.

subtitles.original: But, you can imagine yourself being hugged
subtitles.english: But, you can imagine yourself being hugged

subtitles.original: by getting yourself Warden's Capely Embrace.
subtitles.english: by getting yourself Warden's Capely Embrace.

subtitles.original: Look! Looks like my cape.
subtitles.english: Look! Looks like my cape.

subtitles.original: It's gonna be great.
subtitles.english: It's gonna be great.

subtitles.original: Go get it. Get it! Yeah! Woo!
subtitles.english: Go get it. Get it! Yeah! Woo!

subtitles.original: Who's next? Me! Me, me, me, me!
subtitles.english: Who's next? Me! Me, me, me, me!

subtitles.original: Oh, hi!
subtitles.english: Oh, hi!

subtitles.original: I have here my silicone lantern.
subtitles.english: I have here my silicone lantern.

subtitles.original:
Mumei's Lantern
Size: Approx. H240xW105xD105mm
Material: Lamp/ Silicone, Zinc Alloy LED Light/ ABS Resin
subtitles.english:
Mumei's Lantern
Size: Approx. H240xW105xD105mm
Material: Lamp/ Silicone, Zinc Alloy LED Light/ ABS Resin

subtitles.original: You can be matchy-matchy with me, we can be twinsies!
subtitles.english: You can be matchy-matchy with me, we can be twinsies!

subtitles.original: And it can light up the darkness in your life,
subtitles.english: And it can light up the darkness in your life,

subtitles.original: or it can light up whatever is lurking in the shadows. Yeah!
subtitles.english: or it can light up whatever is lurking in the shadows. Yeah!

subtitles.original: Woo! Get it! Get it! Beb-beb-beb-beb!
subtitles.english: Woo! Get it! Get it! Beb-beb-beb-beb!

subtitles.original: Gee, ever feel like you have nothing in your wardrobe
subtitles.english: Gee, ever feel like you have nothing in your wardrobe

subtitles.original: because all your t-shirts suck? Don't worry, I got you:
subtitles.english: because all your t-shirts suck? Don't worry, I got you:

subtitles.original:
Street Rat T-Shirt
One-size-fits-all
Material: Cotton, Polyester
subtitles.english:
Street Rat T-Shirt
One-size-fits-all
Material: Cotton, Polyester

subtitles.original: the Street Rat T-Shirt! We have the same logo,
subtitles.english: the Street Rat T-Shirt! We have the same logo,

subtitles.original: we can match! We can match!
subtitles.english: we can match! We can match!

subtitles.original: And it goes with the snapback and all your other merch,
subtitles.english: And it goes with the snapback and all your other merch,

subtitles.original: like your bag and stuff. Ayy! Yeah! Get it!
subtitles.english: like your bag and stuff. Ayy! Yeah! Get it!

subtitles.original: Ayo! Yeah! Yeah! And that's not it!
subtitles.english: Ayo! Yeah! Yeah! And that's not it!

subtitles.original: Because we have... the usual!
subtitles.english: Because we have... the usual!

subtitles.original: The usual you never expected though even though it's the usual:
subtitles.english: The usual you never expected though even though it's the usual:

subtitles.original:
3D Acrylic Stand
Size: Body/ Approx. H202-287mm x W95-258mm
Material: Acrylic
subtitles.english:
3D Acrylic Stand
Size: Body/ Approx. H202-287mm x W95-258mm
Material: Acrylic

subtitles.original: the 3D Acrylic Stand! Woah!
subtitles.english: the 3D Acrylic Stand! Woah!

subtitles.original: As promised, the 3D poses!
subtitles.english: As promised, the 3D poses!

subtitles.original: They're much bigger than the usual acrylic stands,
subtitles.english: They're much bigger than the usual acrylic stands,

subtitles.original: and they look really nice together.
subtitles.english: and they look really nice together.

subtitles.original: So you better get the whole set. It's gonna look amazing. Yeah!
subtitles.english: So you better get the whole set. It's gonna look amazing. Yeah!

subtitles.original: Speaking of HoloPromise... yeah!
subtitles.english: Speaking of HoloPromise... yeah!

subtitles.original: Did everyone enjoy Promise's first collab stream? Yeah!
subtitles.english: Did everyone enjoy Promise's first collab stream? Yeah!

subtitles.original: That was fun. I was so happy to be here with you girls,
subtitles.english: That was fun. I was so happy to be here with you girls,

subtitles.original: with HoloPromise! With HoloPromise!
subtitles.english: with HoloPromise! With HoloPromise!

subtitles.original: We promise you many more fun times to come.
subtitles.english: We promise you many more fun times to come.

subtitles.original: Yes! That's a promise! Indeed.
subtitles.english: Yes! That's a promise! Indeed.

subtitles.original: A great future right ahead. Good for us! Cheers to that!
subtitles.english: A great future right ahead. Good for us! Cheers to that!

subtitles.original: That means guys... I'm afraid running out of time.
subtitles.english: That means guys... I'm afraid running out of time.

subtitles.original: Nooo! Ohhh!
subtitles.english: Nooo! Ohhh!

subtitles.original: Looks like we have to go, guys. Nooo!
subtitles.english: Looks like we have to go, guys. Nooo!

subtitles.original: If only we had just one more fun... well,
subtitles.english: If only we had just one more fun... well,

subtitles.original: hold on. Are you asking what I think you're asking?
subtitles.english: hold on. Are you asking what I think you're asking?

subtitles.original: Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore!
subtitles.english: Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore! Encore!

subtitles.original: All right, I guess we have time for one more song!
subtitles.english: All right, I guess we have time for one more song!

subtitles.original: Yay! All right, let's go!
subtitles.english: Yay! All right, let's go!

subtitles.original:
GO!!!
Lyrics: KOHSHI Composition: TAKE
subtitles.english:
GO!!!

subtitles.original: We are Fighting Dreamers 高みを目指して
subtitles.english: We are Fighting Dreamers, aiming for the heights

subtitles.english: Fighting Dreamers, regardless of how we look

subtitles.original: Fighting Dreamers 信じるがままに
subtitles.english: Fighting Dreamers, just as we believe

subtitles.original: Oli oli oli oh-! Just go my way!
subtitles.english: Oli oli oli oh-! Just go my way!

subtitles.english: Right here, Right now (Bang!) Let it loose like a bullet liner!

subtitles.english: Right here, Right now (Bang!) Push forward and get the fire!

subtitles.original: 迷い道の途中 人の地図を広げてどこへ行く?
subtitles.english: In the middle of a lost path, where are you going with someone else's map?

subtitles.english: A richly colored crow snatched it away and tore it up

subtitles.english: Now, open your mind's eye and see the present clearly

subtitles.english: Without a second thought,
